Classes/SmartcarAuth.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: authUrlBuilder()
Classes/SmartcarAuth.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Helper method to generate a SCURLBuilder instance, which then can be used (with various setters) to build an auth URL

Classes/SmartcarAuth.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: handleCallback(callbackUrl:)
Classes/SmartcarAuth.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Authorization callback function. Verifies that no error occured during the OAuth process and extracts the auth code and state string upon success. Invokes the completion function with either the code or an error (and state if included).

Classes/SmartcarAuth.html#/c:@CM@Smartca.name: presentationAnchor(for:)
Classes/SmartcarAuth.html#/c:@CM@Smartca.abstract: Provides a default window to act as the presentation anchor for the authentication session

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: init(clientId:redirectUri:scope:testMode:)
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Constructor for SCUrlBuilder. Represents the minimum requirements for an authorization URL.

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: setForcePrompt(forcePrompt:)
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Force display of the grant approval dialog in Smartcar Connect.

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: setMakeBypass(make:)
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Bypass the brand selector screen to a specified make.

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: setSingleSelect(singleSelect:)
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Ensure the user only authorizes a single vehicle.

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: setSingleSelectVin(vin:)
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Specify the vin a user can authorize in Smartcar Connect.

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.name: build()
Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html#/c:@M@Smartcar.abstract: Build a Smartcar Connect authorization URL string

Classes/SCUrlBuilder.html.abstract: A builder used for generating Smartcar Connect authorization URLs.

Classes/SmartcarAuth.html.name: SmartcarAuth
Classes/SmartcarAuth.html.abstract: Smartcar Authentication SDK for iOS written in Swift 5.

Classes/VehicleInfo.html.name: VehicleInfo
Classes/VehicleInfo.html.abstract: VehicleInfo class is used to describe the vehicle information that may be returned via query parameters in the case of authentication failure.
